GSD.product_version: versions from v5.8 to before v5.15.95
GSD.description:
net: openvswitch: fix possible memory leak in ovs_meter_cmd_set()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.95 by commit 1563e998a938f095548054ef09e277b562b79536, it was introduced in version v5.8 by commit c7c4c44c9a95d87e50ced38f7480e779cb472174. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: net: openvswitch: fix possible memory leak in ovs_meter_cmd_set()
